participants.name: Sarah Russi
participants.title: Senior Technical Recruiter at Procom Services

messages.message:
Awesome perm opportunity - Raleigh, NC relo avail.

Hi Brian, 

I am reaching out because I am currently recruiting for a senior Software Engineer with Ruby on Rails, (Git, MySQL, LAMP stack, AWS, DevOps or anything open source would be great too) to join our educational services client for a permanent, direct hire opportunity in downtown Raleigh. 

They are very passionate about open source technical stacks and have a relaxed, "Google like" work environment making the coolest products. In addition, we have a high success rate placing out of town candidates as they offer relocation packages.

Are you on the market?

Thanks and have a great day!
Sarah

Sarah Russi
(919)480-3910 | sarahr@procomservices.com
Which part of my profile says Ruby on Rails?
